name: Twitter: Masonry Redesigned 1col
description: A new look to twitter. This is my update to this style from the ContentFirst project. (my fork on Github)

user.name: MKody97
user.about: I'm Kody, I live in Switzerland and I enjoy cartoons.

additional_info:
Change your Twitter design to this beautiful style! If you have any problem with this userstyle, PLEASE leave an issue HERE: Github issues: mkody/ContentFirst/issues. NOTE: Screenshot were taken with https://userstyles.org/styles/100163/kody-s-cleaner-new-2014-twitter (better buttons and profiles). Updates:
  • 05/25/2015 - Fix for profiles
  • 05/24/2015 - Fix for search
  • 02/22/2015 - Fix for recent Twitter changes on permalink page for tweets
